name: SalesLoft
description: Revenue workflow platform that helps teams generate more revenue through better buyer engagement.
long_description: SalesLoft is a comprehensive revenue workflow platform that combines sales engagement, conversation intelligence, and revenue analytics to help sales teams engage buyers, generate pipeline, and close more deals with predictable revenue growth.

name: Skysenders
description: SkySenders is a next-gen platform for cold email infrastructure with dedicated server per domain, instant SPF, DKIM, DMARC setup and real-time email analytics.
long_description: SkySenders is a next-gen platform for cold email infrastructure with dedicated server per domain, instant SPF, DKIM, DMARC setup and real-time email analytics.

name: FindyMail
description: B2B Email & Phone Data For Modern Sales Teams

name: Snov.io
description: All-in-one sales platform for finding leads, automating outreach, and closing more deals
long_description: Snov.io is a comprehensive sales platform trusted by over 185,000 companies worldwide. It combines lead generation, email verification, cold email outreach, LinkedIn automation, email warm-up, and sales CRM capabilities in one unified tool. The platform helps businesses discover prospects, verify emails, reach primary inboxes, accelerate LinkedIn outreach, and manage leads with unlimited mailboxes and automated email warmups. Features include extensive database search, ICP targeting, LinkedIn integration, email deliverability optimization, and advanced analytics.

name: ListKit
description: B2B data enrichment and lead generation platform providing verified contact information.
long_description: ListKit is a B2B data enrichment and lead generation platform that provides verified contact information to help sales teams build targeted prospect lists. It offers features like real-time verification, advanced filtering, and integration with popular CRMs to streamline the prospecting process.
cons: Pricing can be high for small teams
Some features are still in beta

name: Muraena
description: AI-powered B2B lead generation platform that helps find high-intent prospects.
long_description: Muraena is an AI-powered B2B lead generation platform that helps sales teams find high-intent prospects by analyzing buying signals and intent data. It offers features like lead scoring, automated outreach, and integration with CRMs to improve conversion rates.

name: Instantly
description: Cold email outreach tool with unlimited email accounts and warm-up features.
long_description: Instantly is a cold email outreach tool designed to help businesses scale their outreach efforts. It offers unlimited email accounts, automated warm-up, and advanced analytics to improve deliverability and response rates. The platform is user-friendly and suitable for agencies and sales teams.

name: Smartlead
description: Cold email automation platform with unlimited mailboxes and AI personalization.
long_description: Smartlead is a cold email automation platform that enables businesses to scale their outreach with unlimited mailboxes and AI-driven personalization. It offers features like automated warm-up, unified inbox, and detailed analytics to maximize deliverability and engagement.

name: Straight Mail
description: Straight Mail is a simple, effective cold email tool designed to land in the primary inbox.
long_description: Straight Mail is a robust cold email tool engineered to ensure your messages land directly in the primary inbox. By focusing on plain-text emails, it bypasses spam filters often triggered by HTML-heavy content. The platform offers features like automated follow-ups, simple analytics, and unlimited sending emails, making it an ideal choice for businesses aiming to maximize their outreach efficiency. Straight Mail also emphasizes compliance with GDPR and other email regulations, ensuring your campaigns are both effective and legal. With a user-friendly interface and a free Bronze plan, it caters to startups and small businesses looking to scale their email marketing efforts without breaking the bank.
